cont.entity_a: Purchased for $450, worth less than $500 unless for collection purposes.
cont.entity_b: Purchased mint condition for $50, good value for money.

cont.entity_a: Superior to Canon Rebel series, built like a tank.
Has 4.2MP resolution, low resolution is a noted drawback.
cont.entity_b: 6MP APS-C sensor, 6.1MP is sufficient for most needs.

cont.entity_a: 8fps performance is impressive for a 10-year-old camera, fast focus with 45 AF points in AI Servo Mode.
cont.entity_b: Performs adequately, excellent color capture, minimal noise at ISO 200, 1/500 sec flash sync.

cont.entity_a: Newer EF-S lenses do not work with this model.
cont.entity_b: Compatible with old film and manual lenses, compatible with Fuji Frontier printer.

cont.entity_a: Image quality at 1600 ISO is usable.
cont.entity_b: Image quality is crisp and clear.

cont.entity_a: Error 99 issue and difficulty finding accessories.
cont.entity_b: CF card holder may crack; use USB for downloads.

cont.entity_a: Pro autofocus, 8.3 FPS, weather-sealed body with built-in hand grip.

cont.entity_b: Great entry-level DSLR, easy to use with many features, well-suited for beginners and intermediate photographers.
Best battery life among DSLRs, lasting weeks, still half full after 500+ photos.
